cards.markdown:
I think most people who attended [LeWeb3](http://www.onemanandhisblog.com/archives/business/le_web_3/) in Paris last year would agree that [Hans Rosling](http://roslingsblogger.blogspot.com/) was the stand out presenter. His graphical presentations of significant society development statistics is awe-inspiring. His recent [TED talk](http://www.ted.com/index.php/speakers/view/id/90) is available as a video, and I couldnâ€™t resist sharing it. Do watch it:
